content.description: Sloped hill with rocks for traversing and freeclimbing on that lead down to the Susquehanna river. Good for messing around on or warming up.Â
content.protection: No protection. Rock slopes off into the Susquehanna river so be careful of drops but it is nothing to be worried about. Open in some spaces so you can be seen from the road.
content.location: Follow the treeline from the parking lot and the rocks start just at the edge of the clearing

content.description: Rocky slope that leads down to the Susquehanna just off of Route 15. Just a short walk from parking and some nice easy traverse/bouldery spots to arm up and mess around on. You can also climb down the slope pretty much to the river as well.
